\index{Graph@{Graph}!getReachable@{getReachable}}
\index{getReachable@{getReachable}!Graph@{Graph}}
\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{getReachable()}{getReachable()}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily std\+::list$<$ int $>$ Graph\+::get\+Reachable (\begin{DoxyParamCaption}\item[{int}]{src,  }\item[{double}]{dist,  }\item[{bool}]{weighted = {\ttfamily true} }\end{DoxyParamCaption})}



calculates which vertices can be reached in a given distance from a source vertex, using an implementation of the Breadth-\/\+First Search algorithm 

\begin{DoxyParagraph}{Time Complexity\+:}
O($\vert$\+V$\vert$ + $\vert$\+E$\vert$) 
\end{DoxyParagraph}

\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em src} & index of the source vertex \\
\hline
{\em dist} & distance \\
\hline
{\em weighted} & bool that specifies if the given distance is referring to the weight of the edges (\textquotesingle{}true\textquotesingle{}) or the total number of edges (\textquotesingle{}false\textquotesingle{}) \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
list containing the indices of the reachable vertices 
\end{DoxyReturn}
